desc: mAddCube coadds as set of datacubes that have been reprojected to the same pixel framework into a final mosaic.

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: Directory containing files to be coadded.

arguments.name: tblfile
arguments.desc: Table file list of reprojected files to coadded.

arguments.name: template_file
arguments.desc: FITS header file used to define the desired output.

arguments.name: shrink
arguments.desc: Shrink-wrap to remove blank border areas.

arguments.name: haveAreas
arguments.desc: Area files exist for weighting the coadd.
